Description: 5 bed, 1,5 bathroom duplex. Located on P street. Granite counters tops, stainless steel appliances, laundry in unit, gleaming hardwood floors, outdoor patio. Available September 1st, 2023. Pet Friendly! Steps to the beach, park, restaurants & bars located on East Broadway.
